items.title: Putin’s quest for immortality including ‘viable’ head transplant surgery
items.description: There are numerous scientists 'working on developing technologies for whole-body transplantation', it's been claimed.

items.title: Sea creature called the ratfish uses teeth-covered rods on their foreheads to have sex
items.description: We feel sorry for his dentist.

items.title: Spanish village where people go wild for tossing their ham
There’s a band in Manchester where the drummer is literally some mushrooms
items.description: Bionic and the Wires, created by Jon Ross and Andy Kidd in 2023, are producing tunes in a way you have never seen before.

items.title: Bodies of two Israeli hostages recovered from Gaza by military as attacks intensify
items.description: The remains of Ilan Weiss and another unnamed captive were found just as Israel launched an offensive on the region.
